MooseX::NonMoose::InsideOut(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::NonMoose::InsideOut(3)

NAME

MooseX::NonMoose::InsideOut - easy subclassing of non-Moose non-hashref classes

VERSION

version 0.26

SYNOPSIS

  package Term::VT102::NBased;
  use Moose;
  use MooseX::NonMoose::InsideOut;
  extends 'Term::VT102';

  has [qw/x_base y_base/] => (
      is      => 'ro',
      isa     => 'Int',
      default => 1,
  );

  around x => sub {
      my $orig = shift;
      my $self = shift;
      $self->$orig(@_) + $self->x_base - 1;
  };

  # ... (wrap other methods)

  no Moose;
  # no need to fiddle with inline_constructor here
  __PACKAGE__->meta->make_immutable;

  my $vt = Term::VT102::NBased->new(x_base => 0, y_base => 0);

DESCRIPTION
